website_summaries.verdict: This glass-top table looks sleek anywhere.
pros: A metal table that is easy to assemble
Straight-line minimalist design creates an airy look that's great for small spaces
Measures  10 inches wide by 36 inches deep by 30.25 inches high
cons: May be a bit on the flimsy side

customer_reviews.title: but looks very nice. Elegant and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: As you can probably guess from the picture and dimensions, it is light-weight and wobbly, but looks very nice. Elegant and unobtrusive, great for a condo, matches my frosted glass and chrome dining table. Packaged well for delivery - the box was banged up, but no problems with any pieces inside (this has become hugely important to me as I've recently ordered a lot of stuff for my new condo, and dealing with damaged deliveries is such a pain).
customer_reviews.author: Khai

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tables!
customer_reviews.text: We just received these are are very happy with them. I ordered the white and it is not sheer or see through which I am happy about. They are very sturdy and a nice size. We have a small apartment in the City and two of these fit perfect in front of our sleeper sofa. They aren't to heavy to move and tuck away when we need to pull out the sleeper sofa. Nice contemporary clean look. The finishes look and feel good. My husband had no problem putting them together. They were not damaged and they don't wobble. So happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table it’s big enough to hold what you need but small enough to use any and everywhere. I bought it initially as a side table for chair (see 3rd pic) but I moved it to the side of the sofa when I put the Christmas tree up and I actually like it better by the sofa. It is very sturdy, clean lines, very easy to assemble, and very affordable. If you are thinking about it... get it your going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish table that can fit in any room
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this side table. There are pucks in the glass that actually screw into the base. So it stays together really well. It feels very sturdy. I also love that it fit in my old apartment and my new house. It's a modern style but can work w/ pretty much anything. Had it for a couple years and am going to buy another one. Still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Pontis

customer_reviews.title: Size is great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. It took me forever to tighten the screws. The instructions to assemble were awful, so I threw them away and assembled the table with 'common sense' 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am clueless about putting things together so I was a bit worried about the "assembly required" for this table. It got here and looks really great...and it looks much more expensive than it actually is. For me, putting it together took about 15 to 20 minutes so for someone who is actually good at assembling things it should be very easy. Great table!
customer_reviews.author: NDP_NYC

customer_reviews.title: great table , less than 1/3 price of big box store
customer_reviews.text: this table is so sturdy and nicely made. When I got it, I immediately ordered another one. I have them side by side in front of the sofa. If I want to, I could put them on either end of the sofa, but I like them like this for now as a coffee table. it is exactly as it looks in the picture, streamlined, clean , contemporary and nice! Actually, I like it better than the big box store's because the bottom pieces are right on the floor as opposed to raised. I think this design is cleaner and better.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the look in my contemporary living room
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the look in my contemporary living room. Only problem is it was soooo low- not the average cocktail table height. Please be sure to measure the height to see if it works with your room before buying. My husband made extensions to the bottom to raise the height- it is perfect with the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: A.Areds

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty console table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking table that was simple to put together. I have it in an entryway with a small plant and decorative dish on it. As other people have mentioned, it's not a very stable item, but it doesn't seem wobbly or shaky to me at all. I do have it up against a wall and that may help. It doesn't seem small, it's a kind of medium size, but there's something "dainty" about it due to the clean styling and glass. I would definitely order this again and am considering the companion tables.
customer_reviews.author: KTeal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small size glass and chrome entry table that would fit in a house that has both Zen and mid-century look. I took a chance on this and was thrilled when we put it together (in a few minutes). It is VERY solid, very good quality chrome, it is so attractive, it has made our entry seem like a new, small room of its own as it has added such a new focal point that is light, does not overwhelm or make the entry awkward. Wow, I wish I had another place for this as I'd love to buy another one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elena F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed, exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This table is wonderful and easy to set up. Measurements added up and the price is unbeatable. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebell

customer_reviews.title: After putting it up and how well it holds itself together I was very impressed and the look that it gave I was very impressed an
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical ordering this but I decided to take a chance. While putting this together I was very put off because it gave me a pre-conceived idea that it will be very flimsy as what many others had complained about. After putting it up and how well it holds itself together I was very impressed and the look that it gave I was very impressed and happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Zinky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful console table, it has brightened up my small foyer!!
customer_reviews.author: zian

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Put together easy enough. Looks super modern. Love the clean lines.
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Put together easy enough. Looks super modern. Love the clean lines. Thank you Amazon for carrying coffee tables! Arrived in 2 days using Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a modern-looking console table to fit in a small space and I happened to come across this one. It arrived in perfect condition and required minimal assembly. It fits nicely into our home. Other tables that are like this cost 3 - 4 times as much. So, I was very happy to have found this one!
customer_reviews.author: cheunggo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the best price we could find around at the best price.
customer_reviews.author: abdel

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile, modern coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Love this low profile table. Very modern.. just the right size for my living room. Was easy to assemble and seems to stay amazingly clean , despite the fact that it is glass. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: fashioncents

customer_reviews.title: Assembles easily and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit went together quite easily and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Price changes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble and matches my coffee table. However, the price did increase by $30 in a week, which was odd.
customer_reviews.author: B Everett

customer_reviews.title: Euro Style Sandor Clear Glass sofa table
customer_reviews.text: The Euro Style Sandor Clear Glass table is exactly what we wanted! Fit our decor perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and also very stylish
customer_reviews.text: This table was exactly what I was looking for and it’s as described. Very good quality and also very stylish. It’s the perfect compact console table!
customer_reviews.author: Evelin Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space needs
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the design and quality of this piece--a good value for the affordable price. I needed a small, glass and chrome console table for a short wall behind a curved sectional sofa. This table was exactly the right size (10" x 36"). The glass top is thick enough to look good and be sturdy for all normal use. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and just a simple durable coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Great table at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Table came really quickly, and it looks great. Would be especially great in a small apartment because it's almost invisible!
customer_reviews.author: newportgirl

customer_reviews.title: Euro Style Sandor Console Table, Clear Glass/Chrome
customer_reviews.text: This table is very nice for the price. Table is particularly nice where space is tight. I would recommend to buyers.
customer_reviews.author: cpattib

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for our office and they look great in the foyer. One of them is slightly crooked and doesn't quite sit flat on the floor. Nothing a tiny piece of folded paper can't fix. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: what goes around comes around

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Euro Style Sandor side table is perfect for our kitchen corner between two leather benches. Great! And it arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Champagne

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Looks like the picture but it's not very sturdy. Sturdy enough for a few things but nothing real heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but rocking
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful but the legs were not the same level on both sides and made the table rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Yisca Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly Glass and Chrome
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful glass and chrome table. This table will add a modern element to your decor. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kamilee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but very cheaply made and needed propped up under one end so it would sit flush on the ground. Not worth the money at all. Again, very cheap. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect!! Very solid for the price and looks much more expensive. It is paired with an expensive dining room table and it holds it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Love Euro Style
customer_reviews.text: This table looks very nice next to my recliner. I have Euro Style desk and chair as well. Love the contemporary styling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maze

customer_reviews.title: my new table
customer_reviews.text: this piece looks really nice once its put together. It does not look cheap and the glass top is heavy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: DeLigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Modern Table
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic in my living room. The only thing I'm a little disappointed in is the width. I thought it was going to be longer, but I still love it. It's very sleek and modern, a great addition to any room. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mel1222

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great end table. Not to steady but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice all together. Metal is just chrome....not to high quality but it looks good as a finished product. I am usuing this table for staging a home and it does make a small room look larger! I was bummed bc I thought that I ordered the three piece set only to realize I just ordered the coffee table. The price was $40 difference. I should have just gotten all three pieces! Definitely buy the set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as I had hoped and looks perfect! It is a low table but this works with my sofa. This table looks really cool with a shag rug.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hines

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, no surprise there. But the construction quality is not so good. It is not sturdy and shaky. Won't be suitable for heavy accessories...
customer_reviews.author: DENIZ E.

customer_reviews.title: To flimsy for foyer
customer_reviews.text: style is ok , The table was flimsy , and I to narrow , Iwas afraid to have it around grandchildren , would easily tip over. The chrome tubing was very skinny. not a good quality. I love the modern style not even large enough to have in foyer
customer_reviews.author: Leslie T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Modern Console
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time looking for a small, modern console for my entryway. Most of the consoles I found were huge. When I saw that this console was 36" W, I HAD to get it, and I'm so happy that I did. It fit the small space perfectly and is a beautiful addition to my modern-style condo. It was carefully packed and arrived in perfect condition. It was easy and quick to assemble. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lil Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Picture is acurate
customer_reviews.text: The item is as pictured. It's not the best quality but worth the money. It's not as sturdy as I would like but it looks nice in the living room. If you want a high quality item, this is not it. However, if you need something inexpensive that looks good, buy it. Delivery was great!
customer_reviews.author: NJ58S-Leen

customer_reviews.title: Very Modern!
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on this all the time. It's slim, stylish and easy to put together. I have a moderately heavy decorative piece on it and it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: T FROM NYC

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Space Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking glass table that fits well in narrow spaces. Very pleased with the look, which is the main point of a table like this.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I had a very specific area that needed a console table and this was a perfect fit. I have found many other similar console tables in style, but were far more expensive. I don't really know why because it is a fairly simple product, but nonetheless, I am very happy with it and it looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barker

product_meta.title: Euro Style Sandor Clear Glass Top Console Table, Chromed Steel Base
product_meta.description: Color:Clear/Chrome| Size:Console TableThe proportions of these three tables (coffee, side and console) are iconic to say the least. Tops in clear or pure white glass float on perfectly geometric chrome steel bases. We're talking Museum of Modern art here. Not really. But it's the right thing to do.
feature_bullets: Dimensions:30.25" H x10" W x36" D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
